title: Riocasino
author: Riocasino
content: Last days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Cocaine and meth have baf come downs im nore curuios to try opiods like norhpine and oxycodone what else you suggest?

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on November 27, 2022, 01:40:18 PMLast days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Do not use any illegal drugs regardless of how distressed you are. For legal drugs, I am not a doctor to give you any prescription, but with just the use of important keywords for your case in Google, I would like you to visit and read these articles:Anxiety MedicationStress: Symptoms and types of medicationsI thought of exploring the medications mentioned in these articles more, but since I am not an expert, I decided not to do that. I don't want to cause harm instead of trying to be a help.Regarding your post, I would suggest you remove the illegal drugs you mentioned. Edit the OP and remove those.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Loosing money can be depressing especially when it is a big amount but this situation should not push you into illegal or self prescribed drug use/abuse. Please by all means talk to someone who understands and know that people have lost that kind of amount as well to gambling and were still able to bounce back. Moving forward, I think you stay away from gambling, or henceforth gamble with only amounts that you can afford to loose to avoid being in this kind of situation again.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Come on guys, this is fishy007s alt. An obvious moron looking to troll the forum with his ridiculous spam topics. Best not to respond to the dude and let him talk to himself.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on November 27, 2022, 01:40:18 PMLast days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Cocaine and meth have baf come downs im nore curuios to try opiods like norhpine and oxycodone what else you suggest?I won't advice anyone to take any narcotics to relieve themselves of that bitter feeling of having a big loss. But I understand where you are coming from its really depressing to lose big cash in gambling but taking hard and illegal drugs aren't the solution instead you keep your mind busy with other stuff like funny videos and maybe try comedy skit or you can take a sleeping pill and have a nice and relaxing sleep over the lost.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on November 27, 2022, 01:40:18 PMLast days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Cocaine and meth have baf come downs im nore curuios to try opiods like norhpine and oxycodone what else you suggest?You seem to have lost your mind which only makes matters worse, simply because you lost a lot of money while gambling and wanted to either vent or pacify it by using illegal drugs. And if you do it often, it means you are a person who has a lot of money because buying illegal drugs is also not cheap.there's nothing wrong with using it to gamble again instead of using it for stupid things you have a double addiction, and use it to gamble in a better way and fix what caused your defeat and fix it. And better yet, you don't do it all.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on November 27, 2022, 01:40:18 PMLast days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Cocaine and meth have baf come downs im nore curuios to try opiods like norhpine and oxycodone what else you suggest?Lol, Help yourself and stay away from drugs my man, it will do you more harm than good, and if losing such amount of money will force you into doing drugs to alleviate the after effect of the loss, then stop betting or gambling with such a high amount and start gambling with an amount you can comfortably lose.Doing drugs, it's Doesn't only destroy your life, it destroys your family, your business, your health, and most deadly of it all is that, you might die at a very young age.Keep away from drugs and gamble responsibly.Quote from: yahoo62278 on November 27, 2022, 01:55:22 PMCome on guys, this is fishy007s alt. An obvious moron looking to troll the forum with his ridiculous spam topics. Best not to respond to the dude and let him talk to himself. Edit: OK missed this, but that by the way.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on November 27, 2022, 01:40:18 PMLast days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Cocaine and meth have baf come downs im nore curuios to try opiods like norhpine and oxycodone what else you suggest?I don't know if you are a troll, as a colleague commented, since it seems from the question that you are, but just in case someone else is doubting something similar, I will answer you seriously.To begin with you shouldn't have a big loss if we are referring to betting money that you can't afford to lose, but if you have a bad streak or lose money within your budget that leaves a bad taste in your mouth, to relax you should only use the drugs that you know and have used, including legal ones. For example, a drink or two. If you smoke marijuana, smoke a joint to relax, if you have never smoked marijuana, don't do it.Hard drugs, the further away the better. Losing a lot of money and trying to cheer yourself up with oxycodone is like shooting yourself in the foot.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: The problem is you have make bet that you can't take up the losses and that is causing you to be depressed. Next time don't bet too much losing 10k is big loss sorry. It can be better for you to relax and wait for trying another day if you are winning in the past but if you are a steady loser, sorry you have more to do to get out from the state of depression. I suggest you can take sedative drink to help you relax and sleep, you will be better with days coming.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: Riocasino on November 27, 2022, 01:40:18 PMLast days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Cocaine and meth have baf come downs im nore curuios to try opiods like norhpine and oxycodone what else you suggest?It would be more relevant to consult a psychiatrist but I really advise you to stay far away from any exciting and dopaminergic drugs like cocaine and methamphetamine, especially. It would stimulate your desire to gamble again to try to recover your losses and to bet unreasonably. If you really need drugs you should opt for (legal) relaxing and anxiolytic drugs like benzodiazepines IMO. When you write "norhpine" it's a misspell of morphine or it's another drug?

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on November 27, 2022, 01:55:22 PMCome on guys, this is fishy007s alt. An obvious moron looking to troll the forum with his ridiculous spam topics. Best not to respond to the dude and let him talk to himself. OP and Fishy007 are most likely the same people based on how he constructed this thread. So, yeah, he got banned from his account and created another one to share all his activities on the forum and it looks like he is not winning anymore and starting he's a new account with losses.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: So you are depressed because you have just lost $10k on your last gambling session, you cant accept it and you are looking for something to make you forget about it for a while?For someone who claim to be quite rich, $10k should not be a big deal unless it is just a BS claim as well as a BS losing story. Quote from: Riocasino on November 23, 2022, 05:09:02 AMI have friend he is,poor and im quite rich. Well, seems that yahoo is absolutely correct about who you are. Someone who used to create winning/losing story in this forum to gain attention from forum members. I guess you have more than just gambling problem but you also have psychological problem, better for you to find professional help asap.

comments.author: Riocasino

comments.author: Riocasino
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on November 27, 2022, 01:49:21 PMQuote from: Riocasino on November 27, 2022, 01:40:18 PMLast days i lost around 10k and i want drugs to get me out out of bed what you suggest.Do not use any illegal drugs regardless of how distressed you are. For legal drugs, I am not a doctor to give you any prescription, but with just the use of important keywords for your case in Google, I would like you to visit and read these articles:Anxiety MedicationStress: Symptoms and types of medicationsI thought of exploring the medications mentioned in these articles more, but since I am not an expert, I decided not to do that. I don't want to cause harm instead of trying to be a help.Regarding your post, I would suggest you remove the illegal drugs you mentioned. Edit the OP and remove those. Appreciate your response. I dont have any anxiety or stress is just upsetting that i lost im not even dwpressed.i just hate losing. Anxiety meds like xanax and avitan can be fun recretionally. However this time i would ike to enjoy opiods.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I do not think it is a good idea to do drugs at all, even especially after a big loss. It can help momentarily, but at the end, you still stand on what lays ahead with the loosing the bet. There is a lot of possibilities with taking drugs after losing. I would be scared, especially knowing that drugs are illegal. You might become hooked if you try a hard drug. There are so many ways to cope with a loss. Having a glass of wine or a run around the block a dozen times can help. I would never ever advise someone to ever turn to drugs.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I don’t think using drugs is a good cure for losing so much money. Maybe you should take a little break away from technology, try & do a trip or go camping out in nature or something. Take a trip with some friends, crack a bunch of beers by a camp fire or something.Try & surround yourself with friends & attempt to forget about what happened. It’s not easy but taking a bunch of drugs is just going to make you feel even worse the next day when they’ve worn off.
